basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time，flower color pink
basic.color: Leaf color green，and will turn pink red with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, resistant to half shade，no apparent dormancy
maintenance.watering: Water every 7-10 days, reduce water in summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
